verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor, A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> le-'A-Saf of Asaph אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, God נִצָּ֥ב <S%H5324><s%> nitz-Tzav standeth בַּעֲדַת־ <S%H5712><s%> ba-'a-dat- in the congregation אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; of the mighty בְּקֶ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev among אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him the gods יִשְׁפֹּֽט׃ <S%H8199><s%> yish-Pot. he judgeth

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai How תִּשְׁפְּטוּ־ <S%H8199><s%> tish-pe-tu- How long will ye judge עָ֑וֶל <S%H5766><s%> 'A-vel; unjustly וּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-Nei the persons רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, wicked תִּשְׂאוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> tis-'u- and accept סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

שִׁפְטוּ־ <S%H8199><s%> shif-tu- Defend דַ֥ל <S%H1800><s%> dal the poor וְיָת֑וֹם <S%H3490><s%> ve-ya-Tom; and fatherless עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni to the afflicted וָרָ֣שׁ <S%H7326><s%> va-Rash and needy הַצְדִּֽיקוּ׃ <S%H6663><s%> hatz-Di-ku. do justice

פַּלְּטוּ־ <S%H6403><s%> pal-le-tu- Deliver דַ֥ל <S%H1800><s%> dal the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-Yon; and needy מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad [them] out of the hand רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the wicked הַצִּֽילוּ׃ <S%H5337><s%> hatz-Tzi-lu. rid

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יָֽדְע֨וּ׀ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U They know וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יָבִ֗ינוּ <S%H995><s%> ya-Vi-nu, not neither will they understand בַּחֲשֵׁכָ֥ה <S%H2825><s%> ba-cha-she-Chah on in darkness יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> yit-hal-La-chu; they walk יִ֝מּ֗וֹטוּ <S%H4131><s%> yim-Mo-tu, are out of course כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All מ֥וֹסְדֵי <S%H4144><s%> Mos-dei all the foundations אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth

אֲ‍ ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> 'ani- I אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'A-mar-ti I have said אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him Ye [are] gods אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem; of you וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and all of you [are] children עֶלְי֣וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon of the most High כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-le-Chem. and all

אָ֭כֵן <S%H403><s%> 'A-chen But כְּאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> ke-'a-Dam like men תְּמוּת֑וּן <S%H4191><s%> te-mu-Tun; ye shall die וּכְאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> u-che-'a-Chad like one הַשָּׂרִ֣ים <S%H8269><s%> has-sa-Rim of the princes תִּפֹּֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> tip-Po-lu. and fall

קוּמָ֣ה <S%H6965><s%> ku-Mah Arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God שָׁפְטָ֣ה <S%H8199><s%> sha-fe-Tah judge הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the earth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah who תִ֝נְחַ֗ל <S%H5157><s%> tin-Chal, for thou shalt inherit בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim. all nations
